An inscription from Delphi (CID II, 4 (FD III, 5, 3) gives, for example, 10 Attic drachms (43.5 grams) as equivalent to 7 Aeginetan drachms  (43.61 grams), giving an error of less than 0.25%.
citations: Kroll 2001; Melville Jones 1993; CID II, 4 (FD III, 5, 3)
